original_text: But the more they were oppressed, the more they multiplied and the more they spread abroad. And the Egyptians were in dread of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 그러나 학대를 받을수록 더욱 번성하여 퍼져나가니 애굽 사람이 이스라엘 자손으로 말미암아 근심하여

sentences.original_text: But the more they were oppressed,
and the more they spread abroad.
And the Egyptians were in dread of the people of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이집트 사람들은 이스라엘 백성을 두려워했습니다.
